title: The Non-Healing Wound
visual_prompt: Dora-style cartoon: Mr. Patel sitting with foot elevated showing ulcer on bottom, Camila examining with magnifying glass, concerned expression, medical chart visible

dialogue.speaker: Mr. Patel
dialogue.text: This wound won't heal - it's been 3 months!

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: When did you first notice it?

dialogue.speaker: Mr. Patel
dialogue.text: I have diabetes - didn't feel it until I saw blood in my sock.

title: The Diabetic Connection
visual_prompt: Poster on wall showing diabetes effects on blood vessels, Camilo pointing to diagram showing narrowed arteries in legs, team discussing

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Diabetes damages small AND large blood vessels!

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Especially the tibial and pedal arteries in the foot.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Without blood flow, wounds can't heal.

title: The Ankle-Brachial Index Test
visual_prompt: Camila using handheld Doppler device on Mr. Patel's ankle, blood pressure cuff on arm and ankle, Camilo recording numbers on chart showing ABI = 0.4

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Let's measure blood pressure in your ankle vs arm.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: ABI is 0.4 - that's severe blockage!

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Normal is 1.0. Below 0.5 means critical limb ischemia.

title: The Roadmap - Angiography
visual_prompt: Large monitor showing leg artery angiogram with contrast dye, arteries appearing as white lines on black background, multiple blockages marked with RED circles, one patent pedal artery highlighted in GREEN

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: Look - multiple blockages but... there's a patent dorsalis pedis!

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: That's our target artery!

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: We can bypass all the blockages and connect to that healthy artery!

title: The Vein Harvest
visual_prompt: OR table with both legs visible, LEFT leg showing marked line along inner thigh (path of saphenous vein marked with BLUE surgical marker), surgical instruments ready

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: We'll use his own saphenous vein as the bypass conduit.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Nature's perfect graft - better than any artificial material!

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Harvesting from thigh to knee...

title: The Bypass Connection
visual_prompt: Surgical field showing vein graft being sewn to tiny pedal artery on foot, magnifying loupes visible, sutures shown as tiny stitches, blood flow arrow showing direction from femoral artery to foot

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: Sewing to the dorsalis pedis - tiny 2mm artery!

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Using 7-0 sutures - thinner than a hair!

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Microsurgical precision required!

title: The Moment of Truth
visual_prompt: Dr. Erben removing clamps from bypass graft, blood flowing through transparent vein graft shown with RED arrows, team holding breath, monitors showing patient vitals

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: Releasing the clamps... here we go!

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Blood is flowing!

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Strong Doppler signal in the foot - SUCCESS!

title: Healing Journey
visual_prompt: Mr. Patel standing proudly, foot completely healed (show before/after images side by side - ulcer vs healed pink skin), team celebrating, Mr. Patel wearing shoes

dialogue.speaker: Mr. Patel
dialogue.text: I can walk again! The wound is completely healed!

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Your bypass is working perfectly!

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Blood flow restored - limb saved!
